title: What's New?
subtitle: New Hint Functionality!
updates: Now pressing the hint button opens a menu with several hint options. Try it out!
fixes: No bug found to fix... Let me know if you find any.
comingSoon: The ability to go back and do previous Connections!

title: What's New?
subtitle: Bug Fixes and Messaging!
description: TL;DR: Some UI fixes and added the ability to add a message after the emojis to make things easier.
updates: Add a message: When you go to share/copy your results, you should now see a field where you can add text. This text will be added to the end of the message. Use it to talk about the puzzle (or gloat, if that's your thing!)
fixes: Fixed a bug where categories containing many items with long names would cause the rows to run off-screen on mobile devices.
comingSoon: The ability to go back and do previous Connections!

title: What's New?
subtitle: Faster loading!
description:
I've added caching in the background so that future loads won't take as long. If you play pretty regularly, you shouldn't notice a long load time anymore. Let me know if you do.

I've also added a Define feature!
updates: Define: Select a single tile and press the 'Define' button to get a dictionary definition.
Added caching (I won't bore you with the techno mumbo jumbo; Enjoy your speedy load times!)
fixes: None. Let me know if you find any bugs.
comingSoon: The ability to go back and do previous Connections!

title: What's New?
subtitle: Lots of updates!
description: Thanks for playing! Since there are lots of updates, I thought I'd start keeping track. Every time I make a significant change, I will release a document like this with a brief explination of the updates (aka: Patch Notes). Without further adieu, here are the changes!
updates: Added more emojis for when you use hints, and when you get the purple group on your first guess!! üß†üßê
Oh! and... added patch notes of course! If you want to see them again, you can find a button on top of the screen.

Cleaned up some of the UI elements.
comingSoon: The ability to go back and do previous Connections!
